Teradyne pulled $1 billion worth of manufacturing from China amid US export controlsTeradyne , a supplier of semiconductor testing equipment, pulled manufacturing worth about $1 billion out of China last year, a Teradyne spokesperson said on Monday, after U.S. export regulations led to supply chain disruptions. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:36:39 GMT ECM7DAGDEVK7XMJS6VTRFNWXWY https://www.reuters.com/business/teradyne-pulled-1-billion-worth-manufacturing-china-amid-us-export-controls-2024-01-29/Karen Freifeld商业
Whirlpool shares slip after weaker-than-expected annual forecastsWhirlpool forecast full-year sales and profit below analysts' estimates on Monday, as the home appliance maker navigates pricing pressure from rivals and higher expenses, sending its shares down about 4% in extended trading. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:13:44 GMT AYHBLDTOM5IGLNLJCVTA2R6I2U https://www.reuters.com/business/whirlpool-shares-slip-after-weaker-than-expected-annual-forecasts-2024-01-29/Reuters商业

Woman tried in London over alleged bitcoin laundering from $6.3 bln China fraudA woman converted bitcoin into cash and property to help launder the proceeds of a 5 billion pound ($6.3 billion) fraud which was perpetrated in China, prosecutors told a London court on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:03:36 GMT HH4Z45TELZIGBAPMZJJHGCN5MY https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/woman-tried-london-over-alleged-bitcoin-laundering-63-bln-china-fraud-2024-01-29/Sam Tobin世界英国
Lawmakers want US to probe four Chinese firms involved in Ford battery plant -letterThe chairs of two U.S. House committees asked the Biden administration to investigate four Chinese companies they say are involved in Ford Motor's planned Michigan battery plant, according to a letter seen Monday by Reuters. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 17:38:54 GMT GB5ORNO4SNOQ7EOS4HPMRIKICY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/lawmakers-want-us-probe-four-chinese-firms-involved-ford-battery-plant-letter-2024-01-29/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
China's vice premier urges more support for listed firms amid market routChinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 11:49:11 GMT W5MPVTZPMRKLPDURIXAAZUUMMM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-vice-premier-urges-more-support-listed-firms-amid-market-rout-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中国
Which countries can Chinese passport holders visit without a visa?China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 10:30:52 GMT JDMGI6KMJFJRLD3LUVYKU7J2FA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/which-countries-can-chinese-passport-holders-visit-without-visa-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中国
China Evergrande acknowledges HK court order to liquidateChina Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 10:09:44 GMT XVSVOTDJGNMVLO7HTL4WIY2NXY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-evergrande-acknowledges-hk-court-order-liquidate-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中国
HEDGE FLOW Hedge funds lap up China stocks at fastest pace in 5 years - GoldmanHedge funds snapped up battered Chinese stocks over three days last week at the fastest pace in more than five years, Goldman Sachs wrote in a note to clients. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 10:06:15 GMT P7HTQGHDM5PKLA65KSYC3Q3E7A https://www.reuters.com/markets/hedge-flow-hedge-funds-lap-up-china-stocks-fastest-pace-5-years-goldman-2024-01-29/Nell Mackenzie市场
China's January factory activity likely contracted but less sharplyChina's manufacturing activity in January likely shrank for the fourth straight month though at a slower pace than in December, a Reuters poll showed, indicating the country's sprawling sector was still struggling to regain momentum at the start of 2024. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 09:02:15 GMT TG23MBPTABP37KZ2WFEZUEKSMA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-january-factory-activity-likely-contracted-less-sharply-2024-01-29/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Philippines denies 'special arrangements' with China to supply troops on reefThe Philippines on Monday denied China had a "temporary special arrangement" with Manila to allow the delivery of supplies to Philippine troops occupying a disputed South China Sea reef, calling it "a figment of imagination". Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:58:06 GMT VLKI3JYFKZIMRG6G2XG7JJKUSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-denies-special-arrangements-with-china-supply-troops-reef-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
